Name: Calculate It!
About the game: CALCULATE IT is a casual math puzzle game with various mathsymbols, which is based on the calculator. You need to make a target number with your logic skills and creativity. Campaign Mode Campaign mode contains 100 hand-crafted levels with different rules and numbers. Challenge Mode Challenge mode consists of random stages which is made by computer. You can play and set a record.
